resources.string:
Zakat is a pillar of Islam whereby we all need 
to pay 2.5% of our total savings and wealth. 
Your compulsory Zakat payment includes Zakat 
on Gold. Therefore, the Zakat you need to pay on 
the Gold you own is 2.5% of its value.

Our Developers
